verses.kjv: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. Corrupt are they, and have done abominable iniquity: there is none that doeth good.
verses.ct: Only a fool thinks to himself, 'There is no God.' They are morally corrupt and commit disgusting evil — not a single one of them does what is right.

verses.kjv: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God.
verses.ct: God looked down from heaven on the human race to see if anyone truly understood, if anyone was seeking God.

verses.kjv: Every one of them is gone back: they are altogether become filthy; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
verses.ct: Every one of them has turned away; all of them have become rotten to the core. Not a single one does what is right — not even one.

verses.kjv: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread: they have not called upon God.
verses.ct: Don't these evildoers realize what they're doing? They devour my people the way someone devours bread, and they never call on God.

verses.kjv: There were they in great fear, where no fear was: for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee: thou hast put them to shame, because God hath despised them.
verses.ct: They were overwhelmed with terror where there was nothing to be afraid of, because God scattered the bones of those who attacked you. You humiliated them, because God rejected them.

verses.kjv: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! When God bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
verses.ct: If only salvation for Israel would come from Zion! When God restores the fortunes of his people, Jacob will celebrate and Israel will be filled with joy.
